page.title: 14The Village Policeman
page.content: {P.C.Collins}is our area policeman. He is based at{Stanton}and covers about 32 square miles. He will cover about 400 miles a month in his car. He has been a policeman for 10 years He works 7 days a week and then has 2 days off. His superior officer is Sergeant Taylor at{Winchcombe.}The most common crime in the area is burglary, there are 2 or 3 a month at the moment. About half the crimes in the area get solved although the crime rate is increasing. P.C.Collins has only arrested one person in the last two months. He has been assaulted when making arrests. He deals with about 15 car accidents a year, but has only ever dealt with 2 or 3 fatal ones. There has only been one murder in the area in his time here. He enjoys being a country policeman.
